title: Exablock
content:
Hi people!

Just to inform about my new typeface, Exablock.  
You can check it out here:  
 [http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/fabio-martins/exablock/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014204832/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/fabio-martins/exablock/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/fabio-martins/exablock/")

It's a modular typeface based on a six-per-six grid.  
It comes in two flavours: Square and Round.
author: scannerlicker

comments.content: Nice! The solution for the Q is clever.
